mapper.select: SELECT * FROM documents WHERE doc_status NOT LIKE 1 AND emp_no = #{emp_no} ORDER BY doc_reg_date DESC, doc_no DESC
SELECT d.* FROM documents d, approval_lines al WHERE al.appr_no = #{emp_no} AND al.appr_status = #{status} AND d.doc_no = al.doc_no AND d.doc_status = 2 ORDER BY d.doc_reg_date DESC, d.doc_no DESC

SELECT d.* FROM documents d, approval_lines al WHERE al.appr_no = #{emp_no} AND d.doc_no = al.doc_no AND d.doc_status NOT IN (1,5) AND al.appr_status NOT IN (0) ORDER BY d.doc_reg_date DESC, d.doc_no DESC

SELECT d.* , al.appr_no , e.emp_name AS emp_name , e.position_id AS position_id FROM documents d JOIN approval_lines al ON d.doc_no = al.doc_no JOIN employees e ON d.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE al.appr_no = #{emp_no} AND d.doc_status = 2 AND al.appr_order NOT LIKE 0 AND al.appr_status = 2 ORDER BY d.doc_reg_date DESC, d.doc_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO documents(doc_form, emp_no, dept_no, doc_title, doc_reg_date, doc_status, doc_urgent) VALUES(#{doc_form}, #{emp_no}, #{dept_no}, #{doc_title}, now(), #{doc_status}, #{doc_urgent})

INSERT INTO approval_lines(doc_no, appr_no, appr_name, appr_position, appr_dept_no, appr_order, appr_date, appr_status) VALUES( #{doc_no}, #{appr_no}, #{appr_name}, #{appr_position}, #{appr_dept_no}, #{appr_order},
now() #{appr_date} , #{appr_status} )

INSERT INTO vacation_req(doc_no, emp_no, title, content, start_date, end_date, used_days, vacation_type) VALUES( #{doc_no}, #{emp_no}, #{title}, #{content}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{used_days}, #{vacation_type} )
mapper.select: SELECT d.* , e.emp_name AS emp_name , e.position_id AS position_id FROM documents d, employees e WHERE d.doc_no = #{d.doc_no} AND d.emp_no = e.emp_no
SELECT v.* , e.emp_name AS emp_name , e.position_id AS position_id FROM vacation_req v, employees e WHERE doc_no = #{doc_no} AND v.emp_no = e.emp_no
mapper.update: UPDATE approval_lines SET appr_status = 2 WHERE doc_no = #{doc_no} AND appr_order = #{appr_order}+1
